## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dotgraphtraits">DOTGraphTraits</a> - Template class that can be specialized to customize how graphs are converted to &#39;dot&#39; graphs.

When specializing, you may inherit from <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/defaultdotgraphtraits">DefaultDOTGraphTraits</a> if you don&#39;t need to override everything.

Definition at line 166 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/dotgraphtraits-h">DOTGraphTraits.h</a>.
